Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel for those who just want somewhere to sleep”

Reviews.Content: stayed st marks 3 nights nov 2011 stayed triple located third floor please note lift hotel personally didnt carry bags stairs arrival departure wasnt huge obstacle previous reviews compact found cosy short stay fan helped lot bit stuffy night normal teacoffee facilities addition microwave fridge bathroom compact modern possibly recently renovated breakfast basic aware booking wasnt surprise breakfast hotel morning basic cereal tea toast didnt issue queues wait door mornings opted liein instead breakfast lovely pub top gardens road called provided towels linen day cleaning lady greeted hall personally found hotel location approx 5 minute walk earls court tube station getting city various tourist attractions 3 minute walk ms various shops giving negative reviews reminded st marks earls court leisure hotel simply sleep night didnt spend time hotel day slept night planning relaxing trip nice hotel id opt expensive light hotel basic hotel standard knowing opted basic hotel found pleasantly surprised comfy clean st marks possibly reason regard ultimately lower expectations rise pleasant thoroughly enjoyable stay st marks earls court

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
